/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, teeming with life, is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. 

Cars and buses, painted in various hues, traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, casting a serene backdrop to the bustling activity below. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, which shines brightly in the top left corner, illuminating the scene with a vibrant energy.
